mapper.select:
select a.app_id as appId, a.publish_time as publishTime, au.username, a.versionname as versionName, a.size, a.update_type as updateType, a.context, s.soft_channel_id as chanId, s.name as chanName, a.status, a.extra from t_app a left join t_app_ch ac on a.app_id = ac.app_id left join t_soft_channel s on ac.soft_channel_id = s.soft_channel_id left join t_admin_user au on a.a_id = au.a_id where a.dr = 1 and a.app_id in (
#{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
select distinct a.app_id as appId, a.versionname as versionName from t_app a right join t_app_ch ac on a.app_id = ac.app_id where a.dr = 1

select a.app_id as appId, a.publish_time as publishTime, a.versionname as versionName, a.size, a.update_type as updateType, a.context, s.soft_channel_id as chanId, s.name as chanName, a.status, a.extra, a.url from t_app a left join t_app_ch ac on a.app_id = ac.app_id left join t_soft_channel s on ac.soft_channel_id = s.soft_channel_id where a.app_id = #{appId} and a.dr = 1
select app_id, versionname from t_app where dr = 1
select from t_app where dr = 1 and versioncode = #{versionCode} order by app_id limit 1
select app_id as appId from t_app where versioncode = #{softv} and dr = 1
select distinct versionname from t_app where versioncode = #{versioncode} and dr=1
select distinct versioncode, versionname from t_app
